attributes.additional_details: Decades of court closures, chronic underfunding, and broken private contracts have left the justice system on its knees. Instead of working to fund and fix it this government is completely destroying it by scrapping our centuries old democratic fundamental right to jury trials dating back to 1220 and the Magna Carta. They have no mandate.
attributes.background: Do not introduce swift trials. Invest more in MoJ.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Do not remove trial by jury for certain cases
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/751480
